summary: The Rural American Vitalization in Extraterrestrial Space Reporting Act of 2025 (RAVES Reporting Act) mandates the Secretary of Defense to study and provide guidance on converting abandoned factories, space centers, and military bases in rural areas into space-related manufacturing facilities and complexes. The study will encompass costs, needs, environmental concerns, economic impacts, workforce skills, collaboration possibilities with community colleges, AI's role in workforce development, and potential funding sources. The Secretary must submit findings to Congress.
